about_the_game:
This Pack includes:

  • T-126 tank (Rank 2 USSR);

  • Zhukovsky's I-153-M62 fighter (Rank 1 USSR);

  • 120000 Silver Lions;

  • Premium Account for 7 days.

T-126

The T-126 is an experimental light tank built in the summer of 1940 at Experimental Automobile Factory #185 in Leningrad, with the intention of creating a modern light vehicle for use in future conflicts.

Despite being functionally similar to the T-50, the T-126 comes with some key differences. The T-126 trades speed for significantly more armor. It’s protected by 55mm on the front plate and 45mm on the turret and sides, giving it protection comparable to the T-34. It’s equipped with the 45 mm 20-K cannon, featuring powerful APHE rounds and a fast fire rate. While still classified as a light tank, the combination of speed, fast reload, and strong armor allows it to be played on the front lines as a conventional medium tank, making it quite versatile.

Zhukovsky's I-153-M62

An advanced Soviet biplane fighter developed from the experience gained during the Spanish Civil War, where it was realized that the I-16 struggled to outmaneuver enemy biplanes. It wears the livery of pilot Sergey Y. Zhukovsky, 127th Fighter Aviation Regiment.

The I-153 is an exceptional biplane, one of the most capable examples of all time, with very few enemy aircraft able to even think about outturning it. It has a strong climb rate and four fast-firing ShKAS 7.62 mm machine guns equipped with incendiary rounds, enough to take down even heavier aircraft. It can also equip bombs and rockets for light close air support duties. While fragile, the Chaika allows you to run circles around your enemies with ease and take them down quickly with a strong burst of fire.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.
detailed_description:
Note!

This product cannot be purchased for PlayStation® or Xbox accounts!

This DLC will only be granted to the Steam account that was used to make the purchase. If you have some issues, please contact our support (login on the website and use the "Submit a request" button at the top).


About the Game

This Pack includes:

  • T-126 tank (Rank 2 USSR);

  • Zhukovsky's I-153-M62 fighter (Rank 1 USSR);

  • 120000 Silver Lions;

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most modern 64bit Linux distributions
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 660 with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) / similar AMD with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months; the minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p) with Vulkan support.
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1060 with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) / similar AMD (Radeon RX 560) with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) with Vulkan support.
  • Hard Drive: 95 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina v.10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (Xeon processors not supported)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro 5200 (Mac), or analog from AMD/Nvidia for Mac. Minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p with Metal support
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Big Sur v. 10.16 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 (Xeon processors not supported)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Vega II or higher with Metal support.
  • Hard Drive: 95 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

name: War Thunder - USSR Starter Pack

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy War Thunder - USSR Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1/8/10
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4GB (Windows Vista/7/8/10)
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.1 level video card: AMD Radeon 77XX / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660. The minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p.
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Ryzen 5 3600 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 level video card or higher and drivers: Nvidia GeForce 1060 and higher, Radeon RX 570 and higher
  • Hard Drive: 95 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: The premium soviet T-126 light tank and Zhukovsky's I-153-M62 biplane, 7 days of Premium Account, Silver Lions – a perfect choice for the beginner Fatherland Defender in War Thunder!
supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese, Russian*, Japanese*, Polish*, Czech*, Turkish*, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
